Name: Bouncing Hero
About the game: Bouncing Hero is an extreme auto-jump platformer. Use your skills to control the knight on his pogo stick and avoid the sophisticated traps to conquer the castle! In the wicked witch's 13-story castle the rooms randomly change every time you enter them. Statues possessed by evil spirits threaten all those who intrude in this haunted castle. Could you be the chosen one who can defeat the witch and conquer this castle?
